Room.Name: Necropolis Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Necropolis Avenue, between the Bushman Estates.
Room.LongDescription: Robert Bushman is one of the richest men in Oceancrest, primarily because of his large estate. The Plantation on the east grows much of the basic commodities that the city requires to survive. The Farms on the west side of the road produce nearly all of the fruits and vegetables consumed by the city.
